trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous call to begin a pool resize operation.
trans-unit.target: Begins an asynchronous call to begin a pool resize operation.

trans-unit.source: The number of target dedicated VMs.
trans-unit.target: The number of target dedicated VMs.

trans-unit.source: If the pool has not reached the targets after this time the resize is automatically stopped.
trans-unit.target: If the pool has not reached the targets after this time the resize is automatically stopped.

trans-unit.source: The deallocation option associated with this resize.
trans-unit.target: The deallocation option associated with this resize.

trans-unit.source: A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.
trans-unit.target: A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task</codeEntityReference> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task</codeEntityReference> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
